root.name: Rodney's Funscreen
root.description: OverviewRodney's Funscreen is an educational game developed by Art in the Box and published by Activision for the PC platform.Rodney's Funscreen was created by Rodney Alan Greenblat, the character designer of the Parappa the Rapper series and Major Minor's Majestic March.GameplayRodney's Funscreen contains five mini games that are aimed at young children. The focus of the games is to teach children different functions of using a computer using silly games. Rodney's Funscreen is guided by a character called The Funscreen Man.
